title: Business Automation
description: Stop wasting time on repetitive tasks. Custom automation that connects your tools and runs your business on autopilot.

hero.headline: Focus on What Matters Most
hero.subheadline: Stop copying data between spreadsheets. Let automation handle the boring stuff while you grow your business.

features.title: Lead Response Automation
features.description: Instant text messages to new leads, automatic CRM entry, and calendar reminders.

features.title: Appointment Automation
features.description: Automated reminders, confirmation requests, and rebooking sequences.

features.title: Review & Reputation
features.description: Automatic review requests with smart routing to build your online reputation.

process.title: Map Your Workflow
process.description: We talk through your current process and identify the biggest time-wasters.

process.title: Build & Test
process.description: Your automation gets built and tested with real scenarios.

process.title: Go Live & Monitor
process.description: Your automation goes live and we monitor to ensure everything runs smoothly.

faq.question: What if my tools don't integrate?
faq.answer: Most modern tools have APIs or zapier integrations. If yours don't, I'll find a workaround or recommend better tools that do the same job.

faq.question: Will this replace my staff?
faq.answer: No. Automation handles the boring, repetitive stuff so your people can focus on actually helping customers.

faq.question: What if something breaks?
faq.answer: All automations include monitoring alerts. If something stops working, you'll know immediately. Plus, you get 30 days of support.
